#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
 
int main()
 
{
  int t,n,p;
  char s[25];
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
 
    scanf("%d",&n);
    scanf("%s",&s);
    scanf("%d",&p);
 
    if((strcmp(s,"odd"))==0)
        printf("%d\n",p*2);
 
   else
        printf("%d\n",p*2-1);
 
 
 
  }
 
 
    return 0;
 
}
